We have to ______ our team spirit.
result.chn: 我们要加强我们的团队精神。()

result.problem: Foreign students who need financial aid ______ have to seek it from the school itself or their own government or employer.
The concept of regression goes back to the mathematician Gauss, who talked about fitting a line through a ______ of points.
result.chn: 回归这个概念要追溯到数学家高斯,讨论的是从若干散点中切合出一条直线(金融市场课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: We are all ______ travelers. Glide through the shadows of this world; others can not see us.
result.chn: 在这世上我们都是孤独的旅行者，在阴影中滑过，没有人能看到我们。()

result.problem: It's an example of a very common tool that's go______g to be really useful to us, not just for do______g search, but for do______g a whole range of problems. That is, ______ essence, the template the describes a log style algorithm.
result.chn: 不仅仅是做搜索,还可以解决一整类问题,本质上，这个模板就描述了,对数形的算法,我们一会再回来。(计算机科学及编程导论课程节选 : 麻省理工公开课)

result.problem: This paper reports a new process of ______ paracetamol from phenol by acetylization, oximation and Beckmann rearrangement.
result.chn: 报道了由苯酚经过乙酰化、肟化、重排反应合成扑热息痛的一种新方法。()

result.problem: "I know some people will regard that as ______ for a digital device but it is, it's more like an album launch or a film premiere because the device is not just something for nerds, it has a cultural meaning too."
And part of the claim is that learning a language, learning to speak, reconfigures the human brain in such a way that is really ______.
result.chn: 这个观点的部分内容是,学习语言,学习说话,会以一种特殊的方式重新构建人类大脑(心理学导论课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: It's here in the small Australian town of Nambour that the battle to ______ polio began.
Well, the soul thinks about all sorts of things, ______.
result.chn: 当然了,灵魂能思考,所有的事情(死亡课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: Huxley points out, "How it is that anything so remarkable as a state of consciousness comes about as a result of ______ nervous tissue, is just as unaccountable as the appearance of the Djinn " - of the genie " when Aladdin rubs his lamp."
result.chn: 赫胥黎提出,"刺激人的神经组织,便能产生像意识状态这般奇异之物,这就好比阿拉丁一擦神灯,巨神灵就闪现出来一样魔幻,无法解释(心理学导论课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: On Monday, Chinese President Hu Jintao stressed China would continue with the ______ reform of its currency,the yuan, but at its own pace.
Batstone-Carr says he thinks BP is strong enough to ______ this double-blow to its bank balance and its reputation.
What should I find but an ______ spider!
result.chn: 我居然发现了一只巨大的蜘蛛！()
